title: I spent over 300$ in league and i got perma banned and i was not even toxic
body: This is so stupid i get perma banned and i didnt curse unless i was quoting what another team member said to me. My past 3 games i get bad teammates and i politely ask them to stop dying and they get super defensive and ask everyone in the game to report me and im sick of this league community. They pick on players that want to do good and support the players that hold us back. I spent so much money on this game and they perma banned me hoping i will make another account to spend more money on. I want my account back. This is so childish riot.

replies.body:
Thread locked due to being over a year old. If you have something to discuss then be mindful of how old threads are and make your own thread about it rather than reviving an old one to do it.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this.

When you are given every other punishment in the escalation schedule and still don't reform, there really aren't a whole lot of options left besides a permaban. 

It has nothing to do with forcing you to make a new account. You were told it was your final warning, and your actions are not welcome in the League community.  You claimed you politely asked your team to stop dying, but in your chat logs you clearly state 'sorry i troleld i got pissed'.

You are of course welcome to open a support ticket.

I would like to know how you are not supposed to be critical of your teammates when they are going 0/6 in the first 6mins or your support nami doing nothing but casting bubble on minions. when you're trying to be competitive? That person wont get perma banned but the person who speaks up does. Regardless of language that person causes toxicity/rage.
Would you mind sharing your reform card?
What is a reform card?

If you were banned by the Instant Feedback system you'll have a reform card that shows your chat logs when you log in, and should have received one by email.

If you were given an escalated ban by a Rioter you won't have a reform card (the Instant Feedback system generates them), but you should've still received an email detailing what the ban was for.

Keep in mind that bans do happen for reasons other than toxic behavior. Could've been a chargeback. Just find the email. If you don't get one, submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Ok well you afk'd and decided to get into an argument while doing so. This game was definitely a valid report, though this is *not* the only one that contributed to your permanent ban. Punishment is dealt in 4 steps;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban

Only in the worst cases of toxicity will they manually escalate a punishment, but otherwise you'll always get 4 strikes now. Each step is meant to give you time to reform, and escalates to give you more time to do so, with the next being harsher for more incentive. Once a player refuses to change at a 14 day ban Riot no longer believes you are willing to reform so doesn't want you ruining any more games and isn't interested in your business; hence a permaban.

If you are still willing to change, you can always create a new account and try to be better.

Riot clearly targets people that spend money on the game hoping they will create a new account and spend more. They gave me no warning of perma bans and i have been way more positive and supportive to my teammates but they dont see that theyonly see me react to people that are flaming me for no reason.
The first chat restriction was a warning. The second chat restriction was a warning. The 14-day ban was a warning.

And i dont understand because if i say one curse word i get suspended but i always get people like this. I kept playing even though i threatened to go afk .but i didnt leave the game at all nor did i intentionally feed. I just wanted blitz to stop flaming me because it was pissing me off. Eventually i apologized just for the sake of the other players that didn't deserve it. But i got permanent banned because of syndra and blitz. Even though i had a decent score and still tried they suspended me. This is not fair.

You admit to making threats, I don't feel sorry for you. Your failure to recognize enemies that are MIA prior to attempting a gank is on you, as you should assume your teammates are bronze 5 at all times.  

Teammates flaming you is not your fault, it's theirs and they'll put their own accounts in jeopardy for their actions. However, you opted not to mute any of them and instead engaged in an infantile debate which escalated enough to get you reported and trigger a punishment. 

Hope it was worth it.

How do you think that you saying you are going to AFK and feed unless your teammate apologizes is acceptable behavior?  You basically held your team hostage because you threw a temper tantrum.  I've reported at least 5 people who have done the same thing.  Ban well deserved.

And there we go.

Permabans don't happen instantaneously unless you do something illegal. Also, the automated system cannot issue permabans--those only happen after a Riot employee reviews your behaviors and logs (irrc). 

If you were banned due to toxic behavior, you should have seen several smaller bans and reform tickets leading up to this. If it truly did come out of nowhere, you should submit a ticket to support.

Money spent does not permit you to circumvent the rules you agreed to and be a dickhead on the Rift without consequence. 

You typed more in that game than I have in my last 50, literally. Shut up and play.
I wasn't being a dickhead in any way i was just reacting to all the flaming i received.
So do you just lack any sense of self awareness?

Reacting.
Does not.
Excuse.
Your actions.

You were still being as toxic as them, so you can still be punished
You should have apologized to your team, not demand apology from them.

The fact that it took Riot 3 years to ban you is what really pisses me off.

You got away with filling the community with toxicity for 3 whole !@#$in years.

You got what you deserved but holy crap, GG Riot.

Hi Artumis1911,

It's hard to give you constructive feedback on the boards if you don't post the chat logs that were sent to you upon your ban. Furthermore, without them posted, we can't tell if you are being honest about how toxic you really were. If the ban was given due to poor behaviour, Riot has mentioned many times in the past that they would prefer you spend your money elsewhere, and not make a new account.

If you didn't get chat logs (your reform card), check you email. It is also possible that you may have been banned for an entirely different reason than poor behaviour. In which case I would recommend contacting [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get more information.

If it was a behavioural ban and you don't want to provide your chat logs to us on these boards and want to appeal the ban privately, and don't want public criticism you should still open a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I hope your future games go well, and I hope if the ban was for a different reason, or if it was a mistake, that you can play again soon.
